As you sail to iconic destinations like Santorini and Mykonos, you'll be mesmerised by the azure seas and charming whitewashed villages. Your Greek islands cruise offers a chance to delve into the magic and mythology of ancient temples dedicated to Greek deities. Explore UNESCO World Heritage Sites such as the breathtaking Acropolis in Athens, the historical sites on the tiny island of Patmos associated with St. John, and the ancient Roman city of Ephesus. Imagine walking in the footsteps of Mark Antony on the same marble streets once trodden by the Roman general and Cleopatra's lover. Enjoy a complimentary Windstar-exclusive evening Destination Discovery Event amidst the fascinating ruins of Ephesus. Windstar’s Treasures of Greek Isles cruise immerses you in the heart of Greek culture. Beyond Athens, visit charming, secluded ports like Monemvasia, a pedestrian-only village perched on a cliff, and Nafplio, a quaint town with cobblestone streets and Venetian fortresses. On your Windstar small ship cruise, Greece reveals itself at a relaxed pace, allowing you time to linger in enchanting locations, swim from pristine sandy beaches, savour local cuisine, and connect with friendly locals while toasting with ouzo and shouting “ya mas” (“cheers”). You might even find yourself dancing like Zorba the Greek at a local taverna. Your Windstar cruise offers an ideal Greek experience, just as you envisioned it. With four decks and a gross tonnage of 5,703, it exudes the intimate feel of a private yacht. The ship features expansive teak decks, a rarity among small vessels, and offers numerous secluded spots for a private experience akin to having your own veranda. Every stateroom boasts ocean views, queen beds, flat-screen TVs with DVD players, and the Owner’s Suite includes a comfortable sitting area. Dining aboard Wind Star includes two main venues: Amphora restaurant, serving gourmet, multi-course dinners in the evenings, and Veranda restaurant, offering a casual buffet and full-service dining for breakfast and lunch. All dining options are open seating. For an al fresco dining experience, reserve a table at Candles, which specialises in steaks and skewers. Amenities on Wind Star include the World Spa by Windstar, a Watersports Platform, Lounge, Pool, and Hot Tub. Wind Star is renowned for its iconic sailing ships, and with the Setting Sails: A Wind Class Refresh initiative, the ship has been revitalised to enhance the Windstar experience. This update features redesigned public spaces and staterooms, including a revamped lobby, a new pool and expanded pool bar, a refreshed World Spa by Windstar, and a newly designed lounge. The initiative also incorporates refined details such as new teak decks and updated décor, ensuring a timeless and inviting atmosphere.
